title: Lamar's contract and Tua's future; Best week-10 matchups; Browns vs. Patriots; Who'll bounce back?
itunes:title: Lamar's contract and Tua's future; Best week-10 matchups; Browns vs. Patriots; Who'll bounce back?
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Nick Mangold open up sharing their thoughts on the bigger concern: Lamar Jackson's contract or Tua Tagovailoa's future; then they get into the best matchups to look forward to in week 10; who'll bounce back after a bad loss in week 9; they preview the big time matchup in the AFC between the New England Patriots and Cleveland Browns; and lastly, they call their shots for the Baltimore Ravens - Miami Dolphins game on Thursday Night Football.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
